title: schedule 1 to the Social Welfare Act 2017 (No. 38 of 2017)) of the Social
heading: 3. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to a
text_raw:
3. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to a 

carer’s support grant in respect of the relevant date. 

(2) In the case of a person to whom sub-article (1) of this article applies, 
the amount of carer’s support grant payable to that person in respect of the 
relevant date shall be increased by €500. 

(3) A person shall not be entitled to an increase in accordance with subarticle (2) of this article where that person is entitled to a payment under the 
Social Welfare (Disability Allowance, Blind Pension, Invalidity Pension) 
(Temporary Provisions) Regulations 2022. 

(4) A person shall not be entitled to an increase in carer’s support grant in 
accordance with sub-article (2) of this article in respect of more than one 
relevant person under section 224(1) of the Principal Act. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 November, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 Novmber, 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection.

EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for the payment of a bonus to recipients of carer’s 
support grant (including recipients of Carer’s Allowance, Carer’s Benefit, 
Domiciliary Care Allowance and other recipients of the Carer’s Support Grant) 
during the week beginning 21 November 2022. 

The amount of the bonus is €500.
